import React from 'react' const TaskList = (props) => { const {selectedName, taskList, defaultCategory} = props console.log(taskList) const filteredTasks = taskList.filter(task => ( selectedName === defaultCategory || selectedName === task.category )) console.log(filteredTasks) const lists = filteredTasks.map(task => (
  • {task.category} {task.text}
    • ) ) return (
    Tasks
      {lists}
    ) } export default TaskList
